# options

**Instance Property**

An array of collaboration options the system displays as a group.

## Declaration

```swift
var options: [SWCollaborationOption] { get set }
```

## Accessing options group attributes

- **footer**: A localized string that provides additional information for the group of options.
- **identifier**: A unique identifier.
- **title**: A localized string the system displays as the title of the group section.

items.description: A localized string that provides additional information for the group of options.
items.name: footer
